page.title: 14Interview - Fire Officer
page.content:
{Mr Burdon,}is the fire officer, his rank is that of Sub Officer at Misterton.There are 16{part-time}fire men on call, living in the area. Their usual work is at steel works, coal mine and the local Newell Dunford works. Mr Burdon said that they have 100 'call_outs' each year. { {Misterton}Fire Station is the newest public building in the area and was opened on 10th September 1984.
A computer terminal links the station with the Nottinghamshire Control Centre, the machine prints out the type,and whereabouts of the fire. Many calls are in response to fire alarms at the nearby Trent Valley Power station. Their worst disaster was the explosion at the{Flixborough Chemical Works.
